CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Opportunity identified: intel gathered from agency/brand indicating the start of a campaign. RFP not yet received.
Proposal: RFP/RFI received.Team working on proposal & response. 4 BANT known.
Negotiations: Proposal submitted in response to RFP. Responding to questions/changes to proposal.
Outcome Pending: Negotiations complete, pending decision. Positive feedback. Recommended to client.
Approval: Verbal approval received. Working on paperwork.
